metadata.title: CVE-2017-14102 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: MIMEDefang 2.80 and earlier creates a PID file after dropping privileges toa non-root account, which might allow local users to kill arbitraryprocesses by leveraging access to this non-root account for PID filemodification before a root script executes a "kill `cat /pathname`"command, as demonstrated by the init-script.in and mimedefang-init.inscripts.

criterions.comment: mimedefang package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
